bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Motor-Operated Valve (MOV) Motor Application, Protection, Control, and Testing in Nuclear Power-Generating Stations
Redline
IEEE Guide for Motor-Operated Valve (MOV) Motor Application, Protection, Control, and Testing in Nuclear Power-Generating Stations - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1290-2015 (Revision of IEEE Std 1290-1996) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Motors used to drive valve operators in nuclear power-generating stations are discussed. Guidelines to evaluate the adequacy of motors used to drive valve operators; to provide recommendations for motor application; and to provide methods for protection, control, and testing of motors used for valve operation are presented.

Motors used to drive valve operators in nuclear power-generating stations are discussed. Guidelines to evaluate the adequacy of motors used to drive valve operators; to provide recommendations for motor application; and to provide methods for protection, control, and testing of motors used for valve operation are presented.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
